long_description: Rushing out the door? The prAna Georgette tote bag easily carries your books, your lunch and your gym clothes all in one place so you feel ready to face the busy day ahead. Zippered main compartment is roomy and easy to pack; two zippered exterior pockets keep necessities such as wallet, ID and phone within easy reach. Cotton handles and removable shoulder strap provide comfortable carrying options. Hemp and organic cotton fabric blend is soft yet durable. Closeout.
